name: six rectangles bag
notes:
crochet your own six rectangles bag with this easy-to-follow crochet pattern, perfect for beginners! this pdf pattern is available as an instant download.

***pattern info***
yarn used: lion brand 24/7 cotton - https://lionbrand.sjv.io/yrkqok
hook size: 6mm - https://amzn.to/4ezrz4x
total yardage: 475m/280g

the finished bag sizes are:
width: 9” / 23 cm
height: 9” / 23 cm

pdf pattern details:
• written instructions in english (us terms)
• includes photo tutorial for visual guidance
• features a graph for the circle base and rectangle panels

a video tutorial is available on youtube.

*links above might be affiliate links. if you shop through them, i earn a small commission, at no extra cost to you. thanks for supporting me and my yarn stash!

---  

***questions & returns***
there are no returns on digital files. please contact me if you have questions about the pattern.

---

***please note!***
please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog. by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns. you can find the free version here: https://wilmade.com/six-rectangles-bag
